Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Very bad service, food too expensive and the quantity of food served was very disappointing. They had a weird rule were they forced all customers to order a plate each, didn't let us order tap water, and the waitress was playing with and â€¦

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: A really nice and cozy small Italian place with a local atmosphere. Burrata was fantastic so as my pene all'arrabbiata. Watch out though, especially in Amsterdam, it's cash only

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: One of the best italian restaurants in town and definitely my favorite!

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text:
Did a take-out order for pizza, quick service and an excellent pizza!.

Only downside is the cash-only payment but with an ATM a hundred meters or so from the restaurant it's not a massive issue.

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Horrible. Four of us walked in and sat down to have some pasta and pizza. We were originally so excited because the bread was tasty. One of us was not hungry so she opted to have just a cup of coffee while the rest of us ordered a full â€¦

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Slow service. Had to remind waiter a couple of times about a straw for the three year old and a beer. When the main course eventually arrived (long after appetizers were finished) they had forgotten the pasta for the child, so again waiting â€¦

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Not a nice experience.  We were the first guests in the restaurant at 18:00. We had the starter at 18:30 and the main at 19:30 (!). The problem is they also do take out service and prioritize that over the food for their guests. We saw â€¦

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: One of my favourite real Italian place in town. Southern Italian cuisine delights. Don't expect them to be super friendly just expect great food. I had this time a lamb roast which was one of the best meats I have ever had before. Cooked slowly in traditional oven. Mama mia, Che buono !!!!!!

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Awful place. First, the oven was not working so they could not make pasta. Second, it seemed like the waitress was talking about us with another customer. Third, we ordered bruschetta and was told in order to sit in that spot we must order â€¦

Name: Trattoria l'Angoletto
Review Text: Very good clean, almost purist approach to traditional Italian food.  Service was exemplary.
